tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_pledges_titles AS SELECT -1 as pledge_id,'No Pledge' as title,-1 as title_id UNION SELECT p.id AS pledge_id, val.category_value AS title, val.id AS title_id FROM (amp_funding_pledges p JOIN amp_category_value val ON ((p.title = val.id))) ORDER BY p.id;;;
